mapper.sql: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

ROW_ID, DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT, DN_DOC_DATE, DN_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, DN_CREATE_BY, MATERIAL_NO, CUSTOMER_MODEL, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION, CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_DATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, DN_CLOSE, FINISH_QTY, UNIT, DELIVER_DATE, BILLING, BILLING_ITEM, FINISH_FLAG, FLAG, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, REGION, CITY, STNO, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_DESC, COST_FLAG, COST_MSG, SAP_FLAG, SAP_MSG, SAP_DOC_NO, SAP_SEND_ID, POSTING_DATE, PICKING_DATE, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_NAME, CUSTOMER_PO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS

SELECT ROW_ID,DN_NO,DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT,MATERIAL_NO, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION,FINISH_QTY, UNIT, FINISH_FLAG,FLAG, CREATE_BY,STNO, POSTING_DATE,PICKING_DATE, (SELECT SAP_FLAG FROM ODS_SO_GR_INFO G WHERE G.DN_NO = STG_DN_DOWN.DN_NO AND G.DN_ITEM_NO = STG_DN_DOWN.DN_ITEM_NO) sapFlagStatus from STG_DN_DOWN
mapper.delete:
delete from STG_DN_DOWN where ROW_ID in
#{item}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SO_DOWN_ID.NEXTVAL AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into STG_DN_DOWN ( ROW_ID, DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT, DN_DOC_DATE, DN_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, DN_CREATE_BY, MATERIAL_NO, CUSTOMER_MODEL, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION, CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_DATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, DN_CLOSE, FINISH_QTY, UNIT, DELIVER_DATE, BILLING, BILLING_ITEM, FINISH_FLAG, FLAG, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, REGION, CITY, STNO, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_DESC, COST_FLAG, COST_MSG, SAP_FLAG, SAP_MSG, SAP_DOC_NO, SAP_SEND_ID, POSTING_DATE,PICKING_DATE, VENDOR_CODE,VENDOR_NAME,CUSTOMER_PO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, COME_FROM_TMS ) values ( #{rowId}, #{dnNo}, #{dnItemNo}, #{sellNo}, #{sellOrderType}, #{plant}, #{dnDocDate}, #{dnLastModifyDate}, #{dnCreateBy}, #{materialNo}, #{customerModel}, #{materialDesp}, #{qty}, #{location}, #{customerNo}, #{customerName}, #{deliveryCode}, #{deliveryName}, #{deliveryDate}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{version}, #{dnClose}, #{finishQty}, #{unit}, #{deliverDate}, #{billing}, #{billingItem}, #{finishFlag}, #{flag}, #{createBy}, #{modifyBy}, #{region}, #{city}, #{stno}, #{dealFlag}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dealDesc}, #{costFlag}, #{costMsg}, #{sapFlag}, #{sapMsg},#{sapDocNo}, #{sapSendId}, #{postingDate},#{pickingDate}, #{vendorCode},#{vendorName},#{customerPo},#{deliveryAddress},#{comeFromTms} )
mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and LOCATION IN (${stgDnDown.location})
and DN_NO like '%'||#{stgDnDown.dnNo}||'%'
and DN_ITEM_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnItemNo}
and SELL_NO like '%'||#{stgDnDown.sellNo}||'%'
and SELL_ORDER_TYPE != 'VFOP'
and SELL_ORDER_TYPE = #{stgDnDown.sellOrderType}
and PLANT like '%'||#{stgDnDown.plant}||'%'
and DN_DOC_DATE like '%'||#{stgDnDown.dnDocDate}||'%'
and MATERIAL_NO like '%'||#{stgDnDown.materialNo}||'%'
and MATERIAL_DESP like '%'||#{stgDnDown.materialDesp}||'%'
and (CUSTOMER_NO like '%'||#{stgDnDown.customerNo}||'%' OR CUSTOMER_NAME like '%'||#{stgDnDown.customerNo}||'%')
and (DELIVERY_CODE like '%'||#{stgDnDown.deliveryCode}||'%' OR DELIVERY_NAME like '%'||#{stgDnDown.deliveryCode}||'%')
and (VENDOR_CODE like '%'||#{stgDnDown.vendorCode}||'%' OR VENDOR_NAME like '%'||#{stgDnDown.vendorCode}||'%')
and CREATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{stgDnDown.begin},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and create_date <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{stgDnDown.end},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO
mapper.select: select CASE WHEN t.dn_close = '1' THEN 'Close' WHEN t.sell_order_type = 'VRE' THEN 'SO Return' WHEN t.sell_order_type = 'VKA' THEN 'Con Pick-up' WHEN t.sell_order_type = 'VKB' THEN 'Con Issue' WHEN t.sell_order_type = 'VFOP' THEN 'Gift Delivery' WHEN t.sell_order_type = 'VOR' OR t.sell_order_type = 'VFOC' OR t.sell_order_type = 'VSAM' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'VOR1' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'VOR2' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'VSPE' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'V3RD' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'VRE2' OR t.SELL_ORDER_TYPE = 'VFC0' THEN 'SO Delivery' ELSE 'Not Support' end from STG_DN_DOWN t where t.DN_NO = #{inpara.orno} AND rownum=1

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM STG_DN_DOWN t WHERE t.DN_NO = #{inpara.orno} AND T.DN_CLOSE = '0' AND t.plant IN ( SELECT DISTINCT w.code FROM cd_user_wh_loc u, cd_wh_info w WHERE w.row_id = u.wh_id AND u.user_id = #{userId} ) AND t.LOCATION IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM CD_USER_WH_LOC WHERE user_id = #{userId} )

SELECT T.MATERIAL_NO MAT, (NVL(SUM(T.QTY), 0) || ',' || NVL(SUM(T.FINISH_QTY), 0) || ',' || T.CUSTOMER_MODEL || ',' || T.LOCATION || ',' || T.MATERIAL_NO) MATDESC, NVL(SUM(T.QTY), 0) QTY, NVL(SUM(T.FINISH_QTY), 0) SCANQTY, T.CUSTOMER_MODEL CUSTMODEL, T.LOCATION LOCATION FROM STG_DN_DOWN T WHERE T.DN_NO = #{orderNo} GROUP BY T.MATERIAL_NO, T.CUSTOMER_MODEL, T.LOCATION
select distinct MATERIAL_NO MAT,LOCATION,PLANT from STG_DN_DOWN where DN_NO = #{orderNo}
select distinct so.dn_item_no from stg_dn_down so where so.DN_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnNo}
mapper.insert: insert into STG_DN_DOWN_DELETE ( ROW_ID,DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT, DN_DOC_DATE, DN_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, DN_CREATE_BY, MATERIAL_NO, CUSTOMER_MODEL, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION, CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_DATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, DN_CLOSE, FINISH_QTY, UNIT, DELIVER_DATE, BILLING, BILLING_ITEM, FINISH_FLAG, FLAG, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, REGION, CITY, STNO, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_DESC, COST_FLAG, COST_MSG, SAP_FLAG, SAP_MSG, SAP_DOC_NO, SAP_SEND_ID, POSTING_DATE,PICKING_DATE, VENDOR_CODE,VENDOR_NAME,CUSTOMER_PO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS ) SELECT ROW_ID,DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT, DN_DOC_DATE, DN_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, DN_CREATE_BY, MATERIAL_NO, CUSTOMER_MODEL, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION, CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_DATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, DN_CLOSE, FINISH_QTY, UNIT, DELIVER_DATE, BILLING, BILLING_ITEM, FINISH_FLAG, FLAG, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, REGION, CITY, STNO, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_DESC, COST_FLAG, COST_MSG, SAP_FLAG, SAP_MSG, SAP_DOC_NO, SAP_SEND_ID, POSTING_DATE,PICKING_DATE, VENDOR_CODE,VENDOR_NAME,CUSTOMER_PO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS from STG_DN_DOWN WHERE DN_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnNo} AND DN_ITEM_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnItemNo}
mapper.update: update stg_dn_down set SAP_FLAG = '2' where DN_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnNo} and SAP_FLAG <> '1'
update stg_dn_down set SAP_FLAG = '1', MODIFY_BY = #{stgDnDown.modifyBy} where DN_NO = #{stgDnDown.dnNo} and SAP_FLAG <> '1'
mapper.select: WITH DTL AS (SELECT FIRST_IN_DATE,BARCODE,QTY,LOCATION,BIN,MATERIAL_NO FROM ODS_INVENTORY_INFO_DTL WHERE MATERIAL_NO = #{materialNo} and LOCATION = #{location} ) SELECT FIRST_IN_DATE,BARCODE,QTY,LOCATION,BIN,MATERIAL_NO FROM DTL WHERE FIRST_IN_DATE >= (SELECT TRUNC(MIN(FIRST_IN_DATE)) FROM DTL S) AND FIRST_IN_DATE < (SELECT TRUNC(MIN(FIRST_IN_DATE + (SELECT MIN(FIFO_PERIOD) FROM FIFO_CONFIG))) FROM DTL S) order by FIRST_IN_DATE
mapper.sql: select ROW_ID, DN_NO, DN_ITEM_NO, SELL_NO, SELL_ORDER_TYPE, PLANT, DN_DOC_DATE, DN_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, DN_CREATE_BY, MATERIAL_NO, CUSTOMER_MODEL, MATERIAL_DESP, QTY, LOCATION, CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_DATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, BILLING, BILLING_ITEM, VERSION, UNIT, FINISH_QTY, FINISH_FLAG, CITY, REGION, FLAG, SAP_FLAG, SAP_MSG, SAP_DOC_NO, SAP_SEND_ID, POSTING_DATE from STG_DN_DOWN dn
mapper.select: SELECT dn.COME_FROM_TMS FROM ODS_SO_GR_INFO so LEFT JOIN STG_DN_DOWN dn ON so.DN_NO = dn.DN_NO WHERE so.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
